objects.specification: A flat classroom floor surface with seamless grey tile texture, matte finish, low reflectivity, and smooth slight sheen to simulate a clean, maintained indoor flooring suitable for a classroom environment.
A vertical structural wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in neutral light grey, matte finish, designed as an interior classroom wall base for mounting educational decorations and fixtures.
A vertical structural wall with a smooth plaster surface painted in neutral light grey, matte finish, designed as an interior classroom wall base for mounting educational decorations and fixtures.

A large rectangular window unit with clear glass pane, slim white metal frame, modern simple design intended to admit natural daylight into the classroom interior without obstructions.
A simple fabric curtain panel in soft pastel green color with gentle folds and a subtle vertical stripe pattern, matte linen-like texture, hanging style to frame a window opening.

A large rectangular blackboard with dark matte green writing surface, thin wooden frame, smooth surface suitable for chalk writing and erasing.
A teacher's desk with a generous rectangular tabletop in natural oak wood finish, sturdy rectangular legs, modesty panel at the front, minimalistic modern style with clean lines.
A teacher's chair with wooden seat and backrest in natural wood finish matching the desk, four straight legs, ergonomic back angle, simple traditional classroom chair design.

A student desk with rectangular tabletop in light oak wood finish, four slender straight legs, minimalistic school furniture design with slightly rounded corners and smooth surface, intended to seat one student.
A student chair with wooden seat and backrest in light oak wood finish, four straight legs, slim profile, ergonomic slight backrest angle, simple school furniture design to accompany a student desk.
